com.ipt.ebsa.environment.build.json

Class JsonFileWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ipt.ebsa.environment.build.json.JsonFileWriter

  • public class JsonFileWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    Parses a build plan from XML file(s) and turns it into a single JSON file ready for consumption by the plugin.
